titles.title: A concurrent resolution directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make corrections in the enrollment of H.R. 1551.
A concurrent resolution directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make corrections in the enrollment of H.R. 1551.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Mr. Collins (GA) asked unanimous consent to take from the Speaker's table and consider.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Directs the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make corrections in the enrollment of H.R. 1551 (Orrin G. Hatch Music Modernization Act) to amend the long title and short titles.
